races.name: Dwarf

perks.Darkvision: Can see in darkness up to 60 feet.
perks.Dwarven Resilience: Advantage on saving throws against poison, and resistance to poison damage.
perks.Stonecunning: Gain expertise on History checks related to the origin of stonework.

races.description: Dwarves are known for their resilience, hardiness, and connection to the earth.

races.name: Elf

perks.Darkvision: Can see in darkness up to 60 feet.
perks.Fey Ancestry: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and immune to magical sleep.
perks.Trance: Do not need to sleep; instead, meditate deeply for 4 hours to gain the benefits of 8 hours of sleep.

races.description: Elves are graceful and agile, with a deep connection to magic and nature.

races.name: Aasimar

perks.Darkvision: Can see in darkness up to 60 feet.
perks.Celestial Resistance: Resistance to necrotic and radiant damage.
perks.Healing Hands: Can heal a creature within touch range for a number of hit points equal to your level, once per long rest.

races.description: Aasimars are blessed with a celestial heritage, often acting as protectors.

races.name: Dragonborn

perks.Draconic Ancestry: Choose a type of dragon ancestry, which grants a specific breath weapon and damage resistance.
perks.Breath Weapon: Can use an action to exhale destructive energy; the damage type and area are determined by your draconic ancestry.
perks.Damage Resistance: Gain resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.

races.description: Dragonborn are proud and strong, with draconic blood granting them unique powers.

races.name: Gnomes

perks.Darkvision: Can see in darkness up to 60 feet.
perks.Gnome Cunning: Advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

races.description: Gnomes are known for their curiosity, wit, and magical aptitude.

races.name: Goliaths

perks.Stone's Endurance: Can reduce damage by 1d12 + Constitution modifier once per short or long rest.
perks.Mountain Born: Resistance to cold damage and can acclimate to high altitudes.

races.description: Goliaths are hulking beings with great strength and resilience, adapted to harsh climates.

races.name: Halflings

perks.Lucky: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll and must use the new roll.
perks.Brave: Advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
perks.Halfling Nimbleness: Can move through the space of any creature that is a size larger than yours.

races.description: Halflings are small and unassuming, but with a knack for luck and evading danger.

races.name: Humans

perks.Versatile: Humans can choose one skill to gain proficiency in.
perks.Adaptable: Humans have a bonus feat at 1st level.

races.description: Humans are the most adaptable and diverse race, capable of excelling in any field.

races.name: Orcs

perks.Darkvision: Can see in darkness up to 60 feet.
perks.Aggressive: As a bonus action, can move up to your speed toward an enemy you can see.
perks.Powerful Build: Count as one size larger when determining carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

races.description: Orcs are known for their might, resilience, and warrior spirit.

races.name: Tieflings

perks.Darkvision: Can see in darkness up to 60 feet.
perks.Infernal Legacy: Can cast the Thaumaturgy cantrip, and later gain spells based on your level.

races.description: Tieflings have infernal blood that grants them unique magical abilities and resilience.
